rsdl.description: The oVirt RESTful API description language.

general.description: These options are valid for entire application.

header.name: Session-TTL
header.description: Idle session TTL. An interval value of zero or less indicates that the session should never timeout

general.name: The oVirt RESTful API generic descriptor.

link.description: get the capabilities of the system listing the features that are supported for all versions of cluster/data center

get the details of the specified cluster in the system

parameters_set.description: update the specified cluster in the system. The capabilities like virt service, cluster service, tarnsparent huge pages etc can be changed.
